  "title": "SXO SMTP Automation Account",

    "no_runtime_user": false,
    "protocol": "SMTP",
    "display_name": "SXO SMTP Automation Account",
    "default_runtime_user_id": "$activity.definition_activity_01MCQVB8PKXSS1P8eYQjfrwxMhxCoXMkf04.output.jsonpath_queries.Email Runtime ID$",
    "server": "mail.ao-local.com",
    "port": 587
  },
  "type": "email.smtp_endpoint",
  "base_type": "target"
}

{
  "name": "SXO IMAP Automation Account",
  "title": "SXO IMAP Automation Account",
  "properties": {
    "ignore_certificate_errors": true,
    "port": 993,
    "protocol": "IMAP",
    "tls_enabled": true,
    "polling_interval": 30,
    "display_name": "SXO IMAP Automation Account",
    "default_runtime_user_id": "$activity.definition_activity_01MCQVB8PKXSS1P8eYQjfrwxMhxCoXMkf04.output.jsonpath_queries.Email Runtime ID$",
    "server": "mail.ao-local.com"
  },
  "type": "email.imap_endpoint",
  "base_type": "target"
}

properties.name: Token
properties.description: Fetch it from Network > Dev Tools > Session > convert using jwt.io, then provide as input.

This automation workflow covers the following,
1. Create webhooks for content-type, application/json, application/xml, application/x-www-form-urlencoded.
2. Create webhook events for each content type in a single workflow and verify if all triggers reach started polling state and webhooks events are triggered for each content-type 
3. Create webhook event with regex condition and test if event triggers when condition is met.
4. Check for 415 error response if Webhook request contains a content-type that does not match.
5. Update content-type from application/json to application/json charset=utf-8 and test if event triggers.
6. Refresh token and test if event triggers with new api-key.
7. Import Webhook Wait for event workflow and check if events gets triggered. Also verify Trigger output parameters.
8. Delete all instances.
9. Delete all workflows.
10. Delete Webhook Events
11. Delete Webhooks.

properties.description:
Covering below scenarios
Positive Scenarios:
1. Create workflow with core actions and schedule trigger

Negative Scenarios:
1. Create workflows by keeping mandatory fields blank - Verify error message, error code
2. Create workflows by entering non existent calendar - Verify error message, error code
3. Create workflows by entering very long name, descriptions, enter special characters
5 minutes from start of work flow
2 minutes from start of work flow

Positive Scenarios:
1. Create workflow with core actions and schedule trigger
